description:
He tricked me thinking he was helping me sell an online item from a game, in the account he contacted me he looked like he had a good reputation and helped others a lot of times. Then he guided me how to have a crypto wallet couse i never had one and somehow without knowing my password or at least i think he didnt know nothing got my money sended to another wallet. Later contacting me, i think that with another fake account, telling me i had to gave him 250 so they can 'unlock' my money.

He tricked me thinking he was helping me sell an online item from a game, in the account he contacted me he looked like he had a good reputation and helped others a lot of times. Then he guided me how to have a crypto wallet couse i never had one and somehow without knowing my password or at least i think he didnt know nothing got my money sended to another wallet. Later contacting me, i think that with another fake account, telling me i had to gave him 250 so they can 'unlock' my money.

Amount lost

1984.04 EUR
